p: The MICs were recorded for L. inermis against E. coli isolate (1.5 ± 1.4 mg/mL) and S. aureus ATCC 25923 (3.1 ± 0.0 mg/mL), and the lowest MBC against E. coli isolate (12.00 ± 0.0 mg/mL). The highest MIC value of L. inermis was against K. pneumoniae ATCC700603 and E. coli ATCC 25922 which was 12.0 ± 0.0 mg/mL for both (Table 4).
